This technique allows the user to turn their body into jet-black steel. Hiruko states that [[Swords|blades]] do not affect him at all due to this ability, which is demonstrated when [[Sai]]'s [[tantō]] snapped clean in half on impact.

== Trivia ==
* The portion converted into jet-black steel is similar in appearance and functionality to [[Kakuzu]]'s [[Earth Release: Earth Spear|Earth Spear technique]], though Hiruko did not show the offensive usage.
